forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High near 55F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low near 10C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low near 50F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 60F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 44F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. Low near 45F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early with mostly sunny conditions later in the day. High around 60F. E winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 64F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 46F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 63F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low 49F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.
